Uses of Class
edu.rit.g2.model.SchemaModel

Packages that use SchemaModel
Package
Description
edu.rit.g2.controller
Contains the controller layer of the Schema2Script application.
edu.rit.g2.generator
Contains SQL generator interfaces and implementations.
edu.rit.g2.model
Contains the core data model for the Schema2Script application.
edu.rit.g2.parser
Provides schema parsing logic and related components.
edu.rit.g2.ui
Contains Swing-based user interface components for the Schema2Script application.
